text: Phasmophobia is an indie survival horror game developed and published by Kinetic Games. The game was released on Steam for Microsoft Windows in September 2020 in early access, along with VR support. The game became popular the following month because of many well-known Twitch streamers and YouTubers playing it, mainly for Halloween. In October 2020, the game was the sixth-most popular game on Twitch and the best selling game on Steam globally. ==References== Category:Early access video games Category:Horror video games Category:Indie video games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Video games about genies Category:Video games about ghosts Category:Virtual reality games Category:Windows games
title: Phasmophobia (video game)
